articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: French far-right leader lays out plan to run for president
articles.description: French far-right leader Marine Le Pen isn't wasting time
articles.content:
PARIS -- 
French far-right leader Marine Le Pen isnt wasting time. She announced her intention to stand in Frances 2022 presidential elections. 
My decision is made, Le Pen said Thursday as she presented her New Years wishes.

articles.title: Georgia parole board spares life of man hours ahead of scheduled execution. Sentence commuted to life without parole.
articles.description: Georgia parole board spares life of man hours ahead of scheduled execution. Sentence commuted to life without parole.
articles.content:
ATLANTA -- 
Georgia parole board spares life of man hours ahead of scheduled execution. Sentence commuted to life without parole.
